entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story, mentioned as being worried about and having his name put in the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who is concerned for his safety and tries to reason with him.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who is worried about Harry, along with Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a friend of Harry's who is also worried about him.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is someone who was Stunned and kidnapped by the attackers.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person who was involved in the kidnapping of Krum.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who thinks that Harry is being targeted.

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: The Goblet of Fire is a magical object where Harry's name was put.

entities.name: snuffles
entities.description: Snuffles is likely a nickname for Sirius.

relationships.description: Harry's name was put in the Goblet of Fire.
Hermione is concerned for Harry's safety.
Hagrid is also worried about Harry.
